data.text: Na afei, sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Sɛ wofa nsu mu a,
Na mene Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn,
Sɛ wosom bo ma me na wowɔ anuonyam wɔ mʼanim
Nsuro, efisɛ meka mo ho;
Mɛka akyerɛ atifi fam se, ‘Munnyaa wɔn!’
obiara a me din da no so,
Momfa wɔn a wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu ade
Aman no nyinaa boa wɔn ho ano,
“Mone me nnansefo, ne mʼasomfo a mapaw no,”
Me, Me ara, Mene Awurade,
Mada no adi na magye nkwa na mapae mu aka se,
Yiw, na efi teteete no me ne no.
Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Mene Awurade, wo Kronkronni no,
Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
nea ɔtwee nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ,
“Momma mo werɛ mfi kan nneɛma no
Hwɛ, mereyɛ ade foforo!
Mmoa a wɔyɛ keka hyɛ me anuonyam,
nnipa a meyɛɛ wɔn maa me ho
“Nanso, womfrɛɛ me, Yakob,
Momfaa nguan mmrɛɛ me sɛ ɔhyew afɔrebɔde,
Montɔɔ nnuhuam mmrɛɛ me,
“Me, me ara, mene nea ɔpepa
Monhwehwɛ nea atwa mu no mu bio mma me,
Mo agya a odii kan no yɛɛ bɔne;
Enti magu mo asɔredan mu atitiriw anim ase,
